mapper.select: select * from m_goods left join m_goods_category on m_goods.goods_category_id = m_goods_category.goods_category_id where goods_id = #{goodsId}
mapper.insert: insert into m_goods (goods_id, goods_name, goods_description, price, goods_category_id) values (NEXTVAL('goods_seq'), #{goodsName}, #{goodsDescription}, #{price}, #{goodsCategoryId})
